item.description:
The food and beer there are great and has a good atmosphere. If you can't find free parking, there is a pay lot that is close. A lot of other places are within safe walking distance if people decide to explore (on Pratt St and even Allyn St). Eat dinner at 7, comedians at 8pm admission is $15.

 

**Afterwards we will be bouncing to either Koji, Pourhouse, Room 960, or Black Bear. We'll decide at dinner :-)** http://citysteambrewerycafe.com/ City Steam Brewery Cafe citysteambrewerycafe.com/ 942 Main Street, Hartford (860) 525-1600

 

If you plan on coming for sure rsvp yes but make sure you show because I will make reservations. Whoever doesn't show we get stuck paying for you and that isn't fair to the rest of us. Looking forward to this and see you all there!

Cheers,

John

 

Brew HA HA Presents Aug. 12th - Aug 13th

JIM COLLITON - Recently on Comedy Central, Has opened for Brian Regan

SCOTT HIGGINS - Regular at the Brew HA HA, Seen in the film, "Zookeeper"

CLAUDIA STAVOLA - Has opened for Artie Lange

(Note: Comics are subject to change each night. We promise to provide the most up-to-date schedule in order to accommodate your plans. Thank you.)

Show Times:
Must be at least 21 years of age with valid ID to attend all performances
Friday: 8:00PM - Admission is $15.00 per person. Saturday: 7:00PM & 10:00PM - Admission is $15.00 per person. WEATHER DISCLAIMER: Refunds for admission will only be made: (1) if the State of CT closes roads into the City of Hartford for travel. and/or (2) The Bushnell Center for Performing Arts and/or Hartford Stage cancel their performances due to adverse weather conditions that same specific evening. We appreciate your patience as we always allow a cancellation time by 5:00pm the day before your reserved show.

Doors open an hour and a half before the show begins; Sat late show, the doors open at 9:30...
Reservations taken by phone 860.525.1600 beginning 3:00pm on the Sunday immediately prior to each weeks' shows, and are also taken starting at 9am Monday through Friday and 10:00am on Saturday.
(NOTE: reservations are NOT taken between 11:30 - 1:30 Monday through Friday)
item.how_to_find_us: Text or call John at 860-919-9782. If not then look for the only tall red head guy in the place :)
item.name: City Steam in Hartford
